'''Mythcon 10''' was the tenth annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference. 

*'''Theme:''' "The Silmarillicon."
*'''Guest of Honors:''' Annette Harper (fantasy artist) and [[Jim Allan]] (Tolkien linguist)
*'''Chairman:''' Lisa Deutsch Harrigan
